articles.title: Saudi Aramco becomes world's most valuable company - Sharjah24
articles.description: Sharjah 24 – AFP: Saudi Aramco on Wednesday dethroned Apple as the world's most valuable company as surging oil prices drove up shares and tech stocks slumped.

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: Chopper crashes in Chhattisgarh’s Raipur, two pilots dead - The Indian Express
articles.description: Initial indications suggest technical malfunction as the cause of the crash.
articles.content: A helicopter owned by the Chhattisgarh government crashed at Raipurs Swami Vivekanand Airport on Thursday night, killing both the pilots.
